attributes.description: The week's selection of beef & pork recipes
This weeks selection for vegetarians
All recipes that adhere to our healthy criteria
These recipes are naturally plant-based.
All the week's chicken recipes
Easy, speedy recipes for busy days
The week's selection of fish recipes

attributes.meta_title: View All Gousto Recipes | Recipe Ideas from Gousto
attributes.description: Not sure what to cook for dinner? Browse our full library of delicious recipe ideas
attributes.meta_description: Not sure what to cook for dinner? Browse our full library of delicious recipe ideas.

attributes.description: Dairy-free recipes: see our FAQs for details.
These recipes do not contain gluten and are suitable for coeliacs.
Everyone's favourite recipes. Easy to make and enjoyed by all, these recipes are always available to buy.

Nuggets are a weeknight winner, no matter what your age! You'll make these plant-based ones from tofu, cover them in crispy breadcrumbs and bake until theyre golden. Serve with hearty homemade BBQ beans and potato wedges.
attributes.name: Tofu Nuggets, BBQ Beans & Wedges

attributes.description: This recipe is your one-way ticket to flavour town! You'll cook onions with balsamic vinegar until caramelised and sticky, to sit over toasted ciabatta. Top with sliced rump steak and served with homemade rosemary salt chips and a drizzle of mustardy mayo.
attributes.name: Open Steak Sandwich, Balsamic Onions & Chips

attributes.description: Inspired by the curry house favourite, saag aloo, this plant-based twist has a rich, creamy coconut sauce and is served with fragrant basmati rice infused with saffron, the worlds rarest spice.
attributes.name: Sweet Potato & Spinach Curry With Lemony Rice

attributes.description: Brilliant for weeknights and slurp-tastic for adults and children alike! Rustle up a simply perfect spag bol with a rich meaty sauce topped with lashings of melty cheddar & fresh basil  dinner is served!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Spag Bol

attributes.description: To recreate this British classic at home, you'll simmer tender chicken, mango chutney and sultanas in a creamy, gently spiced sauce. Serve with rice, fresh coriander and flaked almonds.
attributes.name: Coronation Chicken Curry With Coriander

attributes.description: This mild paneer curry packs in flavours, no punches needed. Mild isn't a byword for boring, because its creamy sauce pairs perfectly with turmeric and sultana rice for a family-pleasing treat.
attributes.name: Mild Paneer Curry

attributes.description: To infuse your burgers with a Middle Eastern-inspired twist, you'll top cumin-spiced British lamb patties with herb-infused feta, then serve with chips and a zingy carrot and sultana slaw. Sensational!
attributes.name: Persian Lamb Burger, Herby Feta & Harissa Mayo

attributes.description: This sweet chilli fish is a breeze to prepare, and will have you enjoying the exotic, spicy flavours of Southeast Asia. Our chilli jam provides sweetness, which works perfectly with fragrant ginger rice and the umami richness of the garlic & sesame pak choi.
attributes.name: Sweet Chilli Fish & Sesame Pak Choi

attributes.description: Our hunger-busting chilli comes with a spice blend youll make yourself, so you can dial up the heat depending on preference. On the table in 30 minutes, youll be devouring it in no time.
attributes.name: Classic Chilli Con Carne

attributes.description: This mild chicken curry packs in flavours, no punches needed. Mild isn't a byword for boring, because its creamy sauce pairs perfectly with turmeric and sultana rice for a family-pleasing treat.
attributes.name: Mild Chicken Curry

attributes.description: Be blown away by these amazing smoky 'n' sweet BBQ fajitas, filled with chicken, cheddar cheese, natural yoghurt and vegetables, all wrapped up in soft tortillas.
attributes.name: Smoky 'N' Sweet BBQ Chicken Fajitas

attributes.description: An insanely delicious plant-based curry  ready in a hurry! This isn't just rapid, it's also packed with vegetables and epic spices in a creamy coconut and peanut butter sauce.
attributes.name: 10-Min Nutty Three Veg Curry With Basmati Rice

attributes.description: Take a walk on the mild side with a crispy chicken katsu curry. You'll serve this Japanese-style supper with an umami-rich curry sauce, wholesome brown rice and fresh salad to the side. Katsu-perb!
attributes.name: Chicken Katsu Curry

attributes.description: In this twist on a tapas classic, you'll serve patatas bravas (crispy potatoes topped in a spicy tomato sauce) with smoky British chicken breast and a dollop of garlicky aioli. Buen provecho!
attributes.name: Smoky Spanish Chicken, Patatas Bravas & Aioli

attributes.description: With just one pan, you'll fill your home with the sizzling aromas of a Spanish-style paella, juicy king prawns, smoky paprika and red peppers. For a dash of creamy citrus, finish with a dollop of lemon aioli. Buen provecho!
attributes.name: King Prawn Paella With Lemon Aioli

attributes.description: Think making healthy choices means being hungry? Think again! This Thai-style dish combines protein-packed chicken breast, fibre-rich brown rice and vibrant fresh veg to keep you fuller for longer.
attributes.name: Thai Chicken, Ginger Greens & Brown Rice

claims.disclaimer: High in vitamin C, vitamin A and copper which keep your immune system strong and healthy

attributes.description: Packed with succulent chicken and an oh-so-creamy sauce, this delicious, hearty pie is full of sweet leeks and carrots too. Top the lot with dollops of crispy skin-on mash and enjoy with garlicky greens on the side.
attributes.name: Creamy Chicken Potato-Topped Pie

attributes.description: This mild fish curry packs in flavours, no punches needed. Mild isn't a byword for boring, because its creamy sauce pairs perfectly with turmeric and sultana rice for a family-pleasing treat.
attributes.name: Mild Fish Curry

attributes.description: For this delicious twist on two Mediterranean favourites, you'll top melty, cheesy risotto with rich, roasted vegetables simmered in a herby tomato stock. Bon apptit!
attributes.name: Cheesy Risotto With Ratatouille & Basil

attributes.description: If you love a fish finger sarnie, this posh twist is right up your street. You'll sandwich golden, crisp basa fillets in buttery brioche rolls with dill mayonnaise and fresh lettuce. So-fish-ticated!
attributes.name: Posh Fish Finger Sandwich, Crunchy Gem & Dill Mayo

attributes.description: Dal makhani hails from the Punjab region of North India. To make our simple twist, you'll top fragrant cumin rice with black lentils and kidney beans simmered in clotted cream and rich spices. Su'd (delicious)!
attributes.name: Punjabi-Style Black Dal Makhani With Cumin Rice

attributes.description: Soboro Don is a Japanese rice bowl, topped with ground meat, scrambled egg and vegetables To make our easy twist, you'll top sticky sushi rice with umami-rich pork mince, scrambled egg and sesame edamame beans. Yum!
attributes.name: Fragrant Japanese Pork Bowl With Edamame

attributes.description: Enjoy a seasonal tart topped with caramelised onions, cheese and roasted British heritage tomatoes. You'll bake it until golden before serving with crispy potatoes and a balsamic-dressed salad. What a dish!
attributes.name: Heritage Tomato & Caramelised Onion Tart

attributes.description: This veggie sandwich packs a punch! You'll pile crispy halloumi steaks into buttery brioche, then finish them with refreshing cucumber ribbons and a dollop of sweet chilli jam. Delicious!
attributes.name: 10-Min Halloumi Brioche With Chilli Jam & Salad

attributes.description: These smoky enchiladas are packed with Mexican flavours. You'll wrap spiced British beef in soft tortillas, top with cheese and bake until crispy. Drizzle with zingy homemade salsa to serve. Buen provecho!
attributes.name: Smoky Beef Enchiladas With Fresh Tomato Salsa

attributes.description: Brilliant for weeknights and slurp-tastic for adults and children alike! Rustle up a simply perfect spag bol with a rich meat-free sauce topped with lashings of melty cheddar & fresh basil  dinner is served!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Meat-Free Spag Bol

attributes.description: Meat-free sausages. Smooth mash. Onion marmalade? Not your regular trio, we know. Its onion marmalade that gives your plant-based gravy a rich tang, bringing this British comfort classic to life. Crisp green beans and oven-roasted carrots make it bursting with goodness too!
attributes.name: Extra Special Meat-Free Bangers 'N' Mash

attributes.description: For this plant-based twist on a curry house favourite, you'll pack your sauce with spices, tomatoes and a hint of mango chutney. Serve with coriander rice, roasted portobellos and flaked almonds. Yum!
attributes.name: Portobello Mushroom Rogan Josh

attributes.description: This creamy farfalle is simply delicious. You'll sizzle smoky British bacon until crisp, before stirring in crisp sugar snap peas, soft cheese and black pepper. Finish with fresh mint to serve. Bellissimo!
attributes.name: Creamy Bacon, Mangetout & Mint Farfalle

labels.for2: 135g British dry cured smoked streaky bacon
labels.for4: 135g British dry cured smoked streaky bacon

attributes.description: For this nutty, herby sausage salad, you'll roast squash, red onions and British pork sausages until golden brown. Toss with quinoa, spring onions, hazelnuts and a sweet onion marmalade dressing to serve.
attributes.name: Roasted Squash & Sausage Salad

attributes.description: Baking tofu gets it nice and crispy without nearly as much oil as frying. Coupled with this heart-healthy, punchy peanut sauce and roasted kale, you'll be on to a winning weeknight dinner!
attributes.name: Baked Sesame Tofu, Peanut Sauce & Crispy Kale

attributes.description: To give this classic an Asian-style twist, you'll marinate chicken in soy, ginger and garlic, fry 'til crisp and serve with nutty sesame fries, a zingy radish slaw and hoisin mayo. Sizzlin'!
attributes.name: Asian Fried Chicken, Sesame Fries & Zingy Slaw

attributes.description: For this quick, easy twist on a creamy korma, you'll simmer succulent king prawns in a fragrant coconut cream sauce, and spoon it over cardamom rice. Divine!
attributes.name: Classic King Prawn Korma

attributes.description: Fish and chips arent just for Friday  youll want to eat this version all week! Do away with grease-soaked newspaper and coat your fish in chive crumbs instead, using lemony mayo as a dip for chips. On the table in just 30 minutes.
attributes.name: Feel Good Fish 'N' Chips With Peas

attributes.description: For this dish you'll pan fry lamb mince with basmati rice and curry powder for a flavour-packed dinner in just 10 minutes! You'll add spinach and grated carrot for some goodness, and top it off with fresh mint, coriander, chilli and a dollop of natural yoghurt!
attributes.name: 10-Min Lamb Keema With Spinach

attributes.description: Let the oven do the work with this simple twist on a Greek spanakopita. Youll top flaky pastry with feta, wilted spinach and soft cheese. Once crisp and golden, serve with crispy potatoes and rocket salad. Delish!
attributes.name: Spinach & Feta Tart, Crispy Potatoes & Salad

attributes.description: Pasta 'con funghi' is a popular mushroom pasta, but you'll make it vegan with creamy coconut yoghurt and thyme-infused mushrooms. Serve with a sprinkle of toasted pine nuts for a plant-powered supper!
attributes.name: Mushroom & Thyme Fusilloni

attributes.description: For this smoky supper, you'll shape smoked fish, potato and spring onion into delicious cakes, then coat them in breadcrumbs for crunch. Serve with minty mayonnaise and a crisp pea and rocket salad. Gorgeous!
attributes.name: Smoked Fishcakes With Minty Pea & Rocket Salad

attributes.description: Brilliant for weeknights and slurp-tastic for adults and children alike! Rustle up a simply perfect turkey spag bol  leaner than beef and served with lashings of melty cheddar & fresh basil. Dinner is served!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Turkey Spag Bol

attributes.description: Fire up your stove for this Chinese-style takeaway treat! You'll add garlic, ginger and chilli (the 'holy trinity' of flavour) to beef mince, toss in your noodles, add a splash of hoisin sauce  and it's done!
attributes.name: Sticky Beef & Broccoli Noodle Stir Fry

attributes.description: Wake up your tastebuds with this sticky chilli sensation. You'll smother crispy chicken in a sweet and spicy sauce, then add a side of crispy salt and pepper chips to serve. Winner!
attributes.name: Sticky Chilli Chicken With Salt & Pepper Chips

attributes.description: Enjoy a simple, comforting pairing of British pork loin steaks with creamy peppercorn sauce. Serve with a side of buttery crushed potatoes and crisp green beans for a touch of class. Bon apptit!
attributes.name: Pork Loin, Buttery Potatoes & Peppercorn Sauce

attributes.description: For this sweet, savoury rice bowl, you'll sizzle hoisin pork with mushrooms, and serve it over lettuce leaves with crispy fried onions. Stir, sprinkle, and it's done in 10 minutes!
attributes.name: 10-Min Hoisin Pork, Mushroom & Rice Bowl

attributes.description: "For this healthier Milanese you'll coat flattened chicken breast with lemony breadcrumbs and bake in the oven. Serve on a bed of wholewheat pasta with tomato sauce and a side of spinach. This Italian-inspired dish is perfect for everyone!"
attributes.name: Protein-Packed Chicken Milanese

attributes.description: "You cant beat pasta can you really? This recipes perfect for feeding the whole family. Its full of ingredients that are such crowd pleasers, like creamy pesto and pan-fried chicken. So simple, so quick and definitely a winner." (Not suitable for nut & peanut allergy sufferers)
attributes.name: 10-Min Creamy Pesto Chicken & Spinach Fusilli

attributes.description: Treat yourself to the ultimate burger. You'll sandwich juicy British beef patties with crispy bacon, oozy melted cheese and tangy burger sauce in buttery brioche buns, and serve with rosemary fries. Irresistible!
attributes.name: Ultimate Cheeseburger With Bacon & Rosemary Fries

labels.for2: 90g British dry cured smoked streaky bacon
labels.for4: 90g British dry cured smoked streaky bacon

attributes.description: Dive into this luxurious one pot, filled with onions and mushrooms that are caramelised until deliciously sweet. Youll also add garlic, thyme and golden brown chicken, then top it with cheese for extra indulgence. Buon appetito!
attributes.name: Creamy Chicken, Mushroom & Thyme Risotto

attributes.description: To serve up these plant-based tacos, you'll pack homemade refried beans with chipotle, lime and smoky spices. Bake your beans in tortillas until crisp, sprinkle with tangy pineapple salsa and tuck in!
attributes.name: Crispy Baked Tacos, Refried Beans & Pineapple Salsa

attributes.description: This dish is all about eating a rainbow because with more colour comes more vitamins, minerals and flavour. For a tasty source of plant-based protein, take your roasted veggies up a notch with beetroot hummus, freekeh and crispy roasted chickpeas.

roundel.name: Health Kitchen - Good for your gut

attributes.name: Beetroot Hummus & Roast Veg Buddha Bowl

claims.disclaimer: 93% RDA fibre and high in calcium which keep the digestive system healthy

attributes.description: Juicy sausages. Creamy mash. Onion marmalade? Not your regular trio, we know. Its onion marmalade that gives your gravy a rich tang, bringing this British comfort classic to life. Crisp green beans and oven-roasted carrots make it bursting with goodness too!
attributes.name: Extra Special Bangers 'N Mash

attributes.description: Layer this tasty courgette pasta up with not one, but three cheeses for a veggie and family friendly wholesome midweek bake!
attributes.name: 3 Cheese Veg-Packed Pasta Bake

attributes.description: For a speedy vegetarian delight, you'll stir-fry golden paneer, crisp vegetables and egg noodles in a punchy chilli and garlic sauce. To serve, sprinkle with crunchy peanuts and it's done!
attributes.name: 10-Min Spicy Chilli Paneer Noodles

attributes.description: Fresh coriander and lime give this chicken curry a mouthwatering zing. You'll stir up a rich coconut, cherry tomato and peanut butter sauce, and serve it over wholesome brown rice. Delicioso!
attributes.name: Brazilian Chicken & Coriander Curry

attributes.description: For this spicy sandwich, you'll fill ciabatta rolls with cayenne pepper-spiced chicken, fresh lettuce and a dollop of roasted garlic mayo. Serve with herby roast potatoes to the side. Delicious!
attributes.name: Chicken Ciabatta Sandwich With Garlic Mayo

attributes.description: Turn up the heat and tuck into a speedy beef stir-fry, tossed with crisp green peppers and a sweet, punchy sauce. You'll serve it piping hot over rice, sprinkled with sesame seeds and fresh chillies. Hao chi (delicious)!
attributes.name: Chinese-Style Beef & Green Pepper Stir-Fry

attributes.description: This Middle Eastern-style stew is packed with halloumi and spinach in a rich and warmly spiced tomato sauce. Serve it with speedy sultana couscous, flaked almonds and fragrant fresh mint in just 10 minutes!
attributes.name: 10-Min Spicy Halloumi Stew With Couscous

attributes.description: "For this speedy Greek salad, you'll top baby plum tomatoes, cucumber and olives with a light lemon and garlic chicken for your nice lean protein. A lovely little herby couscous goes on the side, with a sprinkle of feta for a bit of tang!"
attributes.name: 10-Min Speedy Greek Chicken Salad

attributes.description: This delicious twist on fish pie is so simple to prepare. You'll cook smoked fish in a creamy mustard and spinach sauce, top with crushed potatoes and bake it until golden and bubbling. Delicious!
attributes.name: Simple Smoked Fish Florentine Bake

attributes.description: This traditional-style Greek pasta bake lies somewhere between a moussaka and a lasagne, made even more flavourful with rich British lamb mince, cinnamon, oregano and oodles of cheese. Nstimo (delicious)!
attributes.name: Greek Lamb Pastitsio Bake With Salad
